title: Redefining Veganism in 2018 with Vevolution Co-Founder Damien Clarkson
description:
Episode 29 with Damien Clarkson provides an insight into the Vegan movement in the UK and the role that Vevolution is playing in bringing people together and promoting positive change in the world.

In this episode we talk about:


Damien's personal story and transition to a vegan lifestyle

The UK vegan market and statistics

What the Vevolution mission is

Innovation in the plant based category & opportunities for entrepreneurs to make impact in this space

Large corporations like McDonald's & KFC and how we can support them to promote positive change

Plans for Vevolution going forward including their content creation & events


As always if you enjoyed this episode please share on social media or flick the link across to anyone who you think would benefit by listening.
